column1: Despite the objections raised by the Petitioner the commission proceeded to recommend inter alia

column2: the Petitioner should be punished in accordance with Section 189 read with Section 191
the  Petitioner  had  committed  the  offense  of  abetting  as  per  Section  100  of  the  Penal
the Petitioner had committed the offense under Section 70 of the Bribery Act
Action should be instituted against the Petitioner under Section 335 of the Penal Code
